About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-1pm and 2-5pm. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, newspaper clippings and original records to A3.

About.Access: 1-2 days' advance notice of visit required. Details regarding purpose of study and subject to be researched are required.

About.Acquisition focus: The Art Gallery of Western Australia Library focuses on the selection of materials relevant to the history of art and artists in Western Australia for research, historical purposes. The collection includes information about other Australian and international artists with paraticular reference to the artists in ghe Gallery's collection. Also collected is information on art institutions.

About.Major holdings: Various eg newspaper clippings, journal articles, invitations to exhibitions and catalogues; Artists' files 1950- (65m).

Contact.Street address: Perth Cultural Centre, 47 James Street, Perth 6000
